recommendations: Srimurugan T A ““I have known Mr. Snehanshu regarding a project finance arrangement in the UAE and I found in him a great co-operation with all the aspects. Florindo Cotellessa “I have known Mr. Snehanshu regarding a project in the UAE and I found in him a great collaboration. Besides, I was amazed by its great professionalism and his speed in responding to the needs of the company. A true professional in the banking sector.”
